project_abstract.cdata: The project will first provide for the completion of the Shuikou Hydroelectric Scheme, all components of which were partly or fully covered under the first loan.  These are: (a) construction of a concrete gravity dam with associated spillway, powerhouse and navigation lock; (b) provision and installation of seven generating sets; (c) environmental management and resettlement of approximatly 67,000 people; and (d) consultancy services for design, procurement and construction management.  In addition, the second-phase project will include: (a) increased capacity of navigation facilities by constructing a shiplock; (b) provision of an automated control system for the Fujian power grid; (c) implementation of an action plan for tariff reform; (d) provision of technical assistance and training for planning, commercial and financial management, and project-related technology and management; and (e) a study to explore hydro-based seasonal energy storage options in the Fujian Province and completion of studies on system planning and operations.

P003526.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>水口水电二期项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目将重点完成水口水电工程建设，其所有内容均部分或全部由一期项目贷款提供资助。具体内容包括：（1）建设混凝土重力坝及配套泄洪道、厂房和船闸；（2）提供并安装七台发电机组；（3）开展环境管理和近6.7万人移民工作；（4）就设计、采购和施工管理提供咨询服务。此外，本项目也包括以下内容：（1）通过船闸建设增加航运能力；（2）为福建省电网建设自动化控制系统；（3）实施电价改革行动计划；（4）就规划、商业和财务管理、项目相关技术和管理等方面提供技术援助和培训；（5）研究探索福建省季节性水电蓄能方案，完成系统规划和运行研究。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
